text:
Differential Equations | Exact Equations

Exact Differential Equations General Solution\n[imath]\mathbf{A}(\mathbf{x}, \mathbf{y})+\mathbf{B}(\mathbf{x}, \mathbf{y}) \frac{\mathbf{d} \mathbf{y}}{\mathbf{d} \mathbf{x}}=\mathbf{0} \text { with } \frac{\partial \mathbf{A}}{\partial \mathbf{y}}=\frac{\partial \mathbf{B}}{\partial \mathbf{x}}[/imath]
